column4: Anyone know why update-manager isn't showing 12.04 as a new dist, I'm running 10.04 right now
whats the upgrade path, ubuntu+1 is invite only
apparently they don't want LTS people to upgrade by default until 12.04.1 in july
there may be a way to force update-manager, but I don't know it.  I did the upgrade by downloading the alternate cd and running from it...
